about_the_game:
Portal Brawlers is a side-scrolling Beat'em'Up in the tradition of Golden Axe and Streets of Rage, set in a beautiful fantasy world and embracing the tropes of classic fantasy storytelling.

Choose from Thunk the Barbarian, Omar the Dwarf or Umi the Corsair and battle your way through 9+ levels of Arcade-style Beat'Em'Up Gameplay!

Combining classic brawler design with RPG-Lite Elements like Potions, Equipment and Magic and with a variety of weapons to wield, the players must travel across the land to discover who is behind the mysterious portals that are spreading foul, crystalline corruption - and punch 'em!

Something has been opening ancient Portals around the (unofficially named) isle of Thunkgaria, spilling forth a foul corruption and consuming the land. Native species both hostile and docile are being taken over and driven mad, causing chaos and confusion and leaving several importan questions open for our brave adventurers...
  • Who has opened these Portals?
  • What do they want?
  • When do we get to punch them in the face?
  • Do we honestly get to go Crocodile Surfing? (This one we can answer... Yes! You do!)

Portal Brawlers builds an Equipment system into the classic Arcade formula, allowing for new ways to tackle classic encounters, along with our other exciting features!

  • Find and fight with a ton of weapons, or sheathe them to save them for later and rely on your fists for a while!
  • Block and Parry attacks with shields, deciding between a guaranteed damage reduction or a well-timed parry that can stun your opponent!
  • Wear Magic armour, giving you passive resistance bonuses... or expend it to unleash a powerful blast of magic!
  • Unleash the awesome destructive power of Magic Scrolls, and make them even stronger between missions with the help of the friendly Wizard, Wizzo!
  • Level-Specific minigames keep the adventure fresh! Crocodile Surfing? Minecart Rides? Mountain Climbing? Hell yeah!
  • The Level Hub (our beautiful Tavern) lets you tackle levels in any order you choose! Current level punching back too hard? Visit Wizzo to buy special items for your next attempt, or go for a change of scenery in a totally different location!
